description:
Hakka guards the gate to an otherworldly place where memories of all that exist are stored. The price to enter is one`s soul.
He is fond of alcohol and carries with him a gourd from which he drinks.
He grants http://anidb.net/ch137032 [Momochi Himari] access without taking her soul, content with consuming the light of the Japanese lantern plant (hoozuki ほおずき) that she was carrying.
name: Hakka
